metadata.title: CVE-2024-42067 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Take return from set_memory_rox() into account withbpf_jit_binary_lock_ro()set_memory_rox() can fail, leaving memory unprotected.Check return and bail out when bpf_jit_binary_lock_ro() returnsan error.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-48.48').
linux-aws package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-1018.20').
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
